input.sentences: today is the day we test out our catapult .
everything we worked on was leading up to this moment | can we launch a pumpkin into orbit ( not really ) .
the first test run was a pass | this thing is more powerful than i thought .
with a couple minor tweaks from our staff | this thing was just about ready to go .

output.sentences: It was a crisp fall day when we decided to test the catapult.
It was a job, but we got the pumpkin to orbit for a moment and watched it sail and plummit.
We were able to prove that our catapult was quite powerful with our test run.
The staff added some further tweaks and then announced it ready for a bigger job.
W all felt as proud as if we had created a space station and shouted out yeah.
